price: Kuma idan aka tãra mutãne sai su kasance maƙiya a gare su, alhãli sun kasance mãsu ƙi ga ibãdarsu.
arabic: وَإِذَا حُشِرَ ٱلنَّاسُ كَانُواْ لَهُمۡ أَعۡدَآءٗ وَكَانُواْ بِعِبَادَتِهِمۡ كَٰفِرِينَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-idhā ḥushira al-nāsu kānū lahum aʿdāan wakānū biʿibādatihim kāfirīna
